description.short: Transform any conference schedule into your personal agenda. Import calendars, track sessions, and never miss important events with EventFlow's clean, intuitive interface.
description.full:

app_review_info.review_notes:
EventFlow is a conference schedule management app that imports .ics calendar files. The app works offline and doesn't require any accounts or personal information. For testing:

1. Tap 'Import Calendar' on the main screen
2. Use the pre-filled demo URL: webcal://etlslasvegas2025.sched.com/all.ics
3. Tap 'Import from URL' to see the calendar import functionality
4. Browse imported events in the 'My Agenda' tab
5. Use the search functionality to filter events

The app is fully functional without any setup or accounts.

permissions.reason: To import calendar files from secure HTTPS URLs
For Flutter development tools (removed in release builds)
